languages.text: {n}Если бы Кибелла с детства питалась досыта, не истязала тело испытаниями, не использовала дурман для ритуалов культа... Вы бы сказали, что эти двое весьма похожи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вас не покидает странное чувство. Если бы Кибелла с детства питалась сытно, не истязала свое тело испытаниями и стигматами, не использовала так много дурмана для ритуалов культа... Вы бы сказали, что эти двое похожи. Чрезвычайно похожи.{/n}

languages.text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Если бы Кибелла с детства питалась досыта, не истязала тело испытаниями, не использовала дурман для ритуалов культа... Вы бы сказали, что эти двое весьма похожи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she hadn't put her body through gruelling tests, if she hadn't used an intoxicant during the cult's rituals... You'd have said those two resembled each other a lot.{/n}

{n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she hadn't put her body through gruelling tests, if she hadn't used an intoxicant during the cult's rituals... You'd have said those two resembled each other a lot.{/n}

{n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she hadn't put her body through gruelling trials, if she hadn't used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

{n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she hadn't put her body through gruelling trials, if she hadn't used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

{n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

{n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si, en grandissant, Kibellah avait mangé à sa faim... Si elle n'avait pas soumis son corps à de terribles épreuves... Si elle n'avait pas consommé de substances intoxicantes lors des rituels de son culte... Alors, sans doute, pourrait-on dire que ces deux-là se ressemblent comme deux gouttes d'eau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si, en grandissant, Kibellah avait mangé à sa faim... Si elle n'avait pas soumis son corps à de terribles épreuves... Si elle n'avait pas consommé de substances intoxicantes lors des rituels de son culte... Alors, sans doute, pourrait-on dire que ces deux-là se ressemblent comme deux gouttes d'eau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si Kibellah hubiera tenido suficiente comida al crecer, si no hubiera pasado por pruebas atroces, si no hubiese usado intoxicantes en los rituales del culto... Estos dos se parecerían bastante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si Kibellah hubiera tenido suficiente comida al crecer, si no hubiera pasado por pruebas atroces, si no hubiese usado intoxicantes en los rituales del culto... Estos dos se parecerían bastante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}もしキベラが成長期に十分な食事をとれていたら、もし過酷な試練で体を酷使していなかったら、もしカルトの儀式で中毒物質を使っていなかったら…2人はよく似ていると言えたかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}もしキベラが成長期に十分な食事をとれていたら、もし過酷な試練で体を酷使していなかったら、もしカルトの儀式で中毒物質を使っていなかったら…2人はよく似ていると言えたかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}如果绮贝菈在长大成人的过程中有足够的东西吃，如果她没有让她的身体经受严酷的考验，如果她没有在教派仪式期间使用各种麻醉物质……你或许会说，这两个人长得实在是太像了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}如果绮贝菈在长大成人的过程中有足够的东西吃，如果她没有让她的身体经受严酷的考验，如果她没有在教派仪式期间使用各种麻醉物质……你或许会说，这两个人长得实在是太像了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wenn Kibellah in ihrer Kindheit genug zu essen gehabt hätte, wenn sie ihren Körper nicht grausamen Prüfungen unterzogen hätte, wenn sie bei den Ritualen des Kults keine Rauschmittel genommen hätte ... dann hätte man sagen können, dass die beiden sich ziemlich ähnelten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wenn Kibellah in ihrer Kindheit genug zu essen gehabt hätte, wenn sie ihren Körper nicht grausamen Prüfungen unterzogen hätte, wenn sie bei den Ritualen des Kults keine Rauschmittel genommen hätte ... dann hätte man sagen können, dass die beiden sich ziemlich ähnelten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eğer ki Kibellah büyürken yeteri kadar beslenseydi, bedenini eziyetli imtihanlara tabi tutmasaydı ve tarikat ayinleri esnasında uyarıcı maddeler kullanmasaydı... İkisi arasında ciddi bir benzerlik olduğunu söyleyebilirdin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If Kibellah had had enough to eat growing up, if she had not put her body through gruelling trials, if she had not used intoxicants during the cult's rituals... You might have said the two bore quite the resemblance to each other.{/n}
